name: Tankrovia
description:
Tankrovia is a Top Down Twin Stick Battle Arena with, you guessed it: Tanks! Play as one of the somewhat unique pilots with unique abilities. Explode your opponents in Free-for-All or Teams matches!
The game is a confusing mix of moba, contra3, and classic tank games.
Straight-forward, chaotic, and explosive; though it's designed to take advantage of a bit of strategy and careful positioning.

Current version of the game has 4 pilots, and 2 arenas to choose from.

The next 3 big updates will EACH add a new pilot and 2 more arenas!
